column4: does anyone know where I can go for fan issues with 9.10 (that didnt exist in 9.04)

can anyone help with fan troubles or wrong channel
are they stalking you?
:p
what?

lol it was a joke, fans are also people that are a fan of you
not only the rotating things
well i have a bug report out but very few answers, and lol too early in the morning to keep up
ah its a software problem? with ubuntu controlling the fans or something?
ya and lm_sensors cannot detect my fan speed
so i cant control it with that
ah then this is definitely the good channel if you use ubuntu :p
cant help though sorry
hahaha kk
ill keep trying to find someone who can
make sure they understand its ubuntu controlling the fans thats the problem, if you ask about it

in that case ##linux is also a good place'
